topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55153a58636872325d062a00#post_55153a58636872325d062a00
There had always been one thing that bothered me throughout the lore of the game.
Every animatronic (except the toy versions) are represented by the children that were killed by the Purple Guy. Spring Trap is represented by the Purple Guy. And if you get the good ending...

Golden Freddy is represented by the crying kid.

What bothered me is that the children killed became murderous animatronics but Golden Freddy... well, he's not really murderous. In fact, we don't even know what he is. All we know is that if he catches you, the game ends. Not "game over", not "you lose", the game just ends.

Also, Golden Freddy doesn't move at all. He is always in a limp position, like there's nothing to move him.

This is why my theory was that the crying kid was the only survivor. The fact that Golden Freddy is all limp is because there's nothing in him. There is no soul that resides in his body. The crying kid represents Golden Freddy and yet, the animatronic's not even alive. Not like the others.

The animatronic is empty.
